title: How to Make Rainbow Grilled Cheese Sandwiches

steps.headline: Sauté the vegetables.
steps.description: Allow the red, orange, and yellow bell peppers to Sauté in a large oiled skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir for 5 minutes before adding the purple cabbage. Continue to Sauté for another 2 minutes. Add the spinach into the mixture and remove from the heat.

steps.headline: Prepare the bread slices.
steps.description: Thinly spread the butter on each bread slice.

steps.headline: Add the bread slices to a pan.
steps.description: Place the slices in an oiled skillet over medium heat, buttered side down. Lay the cheese slices on top of each bread slice.

steps.headline: Add the vegetable slices to two slices of bread.
steps.description: Bunch about half of each vegetable in rows on top of the cheese.

steps.headline: Grill the sandwiches.
steps.description: Allow the bread to toast on the bottom and cheese to melt before removing from the heat.

steps.headline: Put the sandwiches together.
steps.description: Add the cheese-only bread slices on top of the vegetable bread slices.

steps.headline: Serve the sandwiches.
steps.description: Serve them with a side of coleslaw or veggie chips.

steps.headline: Combine the three type of cheese into a large bowl and mix.
Divide the cheese mixture into four small bowls.
Add 5-7 drops of food coloring into the cheese and stir with a spoon.
Spread the butter on the slices of bread.
Place two of bread slices on a hot griddle on medium heat.
Top the bread slices with colored cheese.
steps.description: Make four rows of colored cheese on the two slices of bread.

steps.headline: Close the sandwiches with the other two slices of bread.
Cook both sides of the sandwiches until its golden brown and crispy.
Serve.
steps.description: Place both sandwiches on a serving plate. Garnish with rainbow sprinkles if desired Enjoy!

text: Vegetable Method Sauté the vegetables. Allow the red, orange, and yellow bell peppers to Sauté in a large oiled skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir for 5 minutes before adding the purple cabbage. Continue to Sauté for another 2 minutes. Add the spinach into the mixture and remove from the heat. Prepare the bread slices. Thinly spread the butter on each bread slice. Add the bread slices to a pan. Place the slices in an oiled skillet over medium heat, buttered side down. Lay the cheese slices on top of each bread slice. Add the vegetable slices to two slices of bread. Bunch about half of each vegetable in rows on top of the cheese. Grill the sandwiches. Allow the bread to toast on the bottom and cheese to melt before removing from the heat. Put the sandwiches together. Add the cheese-only bread slices on top of the vegetable bread slices. Serve the sandwiches. Serve them with a side of coleslaw or veggie chips. Food Coloring Method Combine the three type of cheese into a large bowl and mix.  Divide the cheese mixture into four small bowls.  Add 5-7 drops of food coloring into the cheese and stir with a spoon.  Spread the butter on the slices of bread.  Place two of bread slices on a hot griddle on medium heat.  Top the bread slices with colored cheese. Make four rows of colored cheese on the two slices of bread. Close the sandwiches with the other two slices of bread.  Cook both sides of the sandwiches until its golden brown and crispy.  Serve. Place both sandwiches on a serving plate. Garnish with rainbow sprinkles if desired Enjoy!
